metadata.name: API Integration Research & Implementation
metadata.description: Research-driven workflow for discovering, evaluating, and implementing third-party API integrations with MCP servers.

workflow.description: Automated api integration research & implementation workflow

steps.action: Search existing integrations and API documentation in knowledge base
Research API capabilities, rate limits, and authentication methods
Design integration architecture and data flow patterns
Document API endpoints, request/response schemas, and error handling
Implement MCP server with type-safe API client
Create integration tests with mock API responses
Audit API security: credential storage, rate limiting, data validation
Write usage documentation and example workflows

benefits: Systematic API evaluation and integration planning
Type-safe implementation with comprehensive error handling
Automated testing with mock servers for reliability
Reusable MCP server for team-wide API access
